item.title: Inventory Management System
item.description: This inventory system was built with a microservices architecture using Flask and RabbitMQ for decoupled inter-service communication. Key services include health checks, item management, stock updates, and order handling. MongoDB was used for data persistence with full CRUD support. The entire system is containerized using Docker for seamless deployment across environments.

item.title: Restaurant Booking App
item.description: Users can reserve tables and manage bookings. Data is stored in MongoDB Atlas, and the UI is deployed via Vercel. Mobile-friendly design. Instant table booking. Modern frontend and backend stack.
